recurringEvents.title: Sunday Walk
recurringEvents.message: Regular Sunday walk around the beautiful Hutt Valley trails. Summer time: 9:00 AM, Winter time: 9:30 AM.

recurringEvents.title: Tuesday Walk
recurringEvents.message: Midweek walking session exploring different routes around Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone, Wellington, and Coast.

specialEvents.title: Christmas Walk
specialEvents.message: Special Christmas morning walk with festive treats and community celebration.
